browser.description: The name of the browser in which to run the tests.

browserVersion.description: Which version of the browser to use.

defaults.description: Settings that are applied onto every suite by default, if no value is set on a suite explicitly.

env.description: Set one or more environment variables. Values can be environment variables themselves. Not supported when running espresso/xcuitest!

mode.description: Instructs saucectl run tests remotely through Sauce Labs (sauce) or locally on docker.

platformName.description: A specific operating system on which to run the tests. Sauce Labs will try to choose a reasonable default if not explicitly specified.

rootDir.description: The directory of files that need to be bundled and uploaded for the tests to run.

screenResolution.description: Specifies a browser window screen resolution, which may be useful if you are attempting to simulate a browser on a particular device type.

timeout.description: Instructs how long (in ms, s, m, or h) saucectl should wait for a suite to complete.

version.description: Which framework version to use. Please consult https://docs.saucelabs.com/web-apps/automated-testing/cypress#supported-testing-platforms for available versions.

showConsoleLog.description: Shows suites console.log locally. By default console.log is only shown on failures.

preExec.description: Specifies which commands to execute before starting the tests.

excludedTestFiles.description: Exclude test files to skip the tests.

audioCapture.description: Overwrite settings for real device to capture audio.

instrumentation.description: Overwrite settings for real device instrumentation.

networkCapture.description: Overwrite settings for real device to capture network.
